sentences.sContent: In Paraguay, people create an effigy and dress him up like a scarecrow when the new year comes.
sentences.sContent_eng: In Paraguay, people create an effigy and dress him up like a scarecrow when the new year comes.
sentences.sCn: 每逢新年来临，巴拉圭人都会专门制作雕像，然后把雕像打扮成稻草人的样子。

sentences.sContent: He stated that the charity was actually initiated by two sisters named Preston and that the effigy on the cake was that of two poor widows.
sentences.sContent_eng: He stated that the charity was actually initiated by two sisters named Preston and that the effigy on the cake was that of two poor widows.
sentences.sCn: 他认为该慈善活动最初是由普列斯顿两姐妹发起的，糕饼上的肖像则是两位贫穷的寡妇。

sentences.sContent: Protesters set fire to government building and burned his likeness in effigy.
sentences.sContent_eng: Protesters set fire to government building and burned his likeness in effigy.
sentences.sCn: 抗议者点燃了政府大楼和卡扎菲的肖像。

remMethod.val: ef + fig (形状) + y → 杜莎夫人馆的蜡像就是按照明星政客本人的形状造出的 → 肖像， 雕像
